snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday dropped two of the 24 terrorist attacks that a jury found Jordan-based Arab Bank liable for by granting a motion by the bank that argued the plaintiffs had not sufficiently demonstrated that the terrorist group Hamas had...
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday dropped two of the 24 terrorist attacks that a jury found Jordan-based Arab Bank liable for by granting a motion by the bank that argued the plaintiffs had not sufficiently demonstrated that the terrorist group Hamas had committed the attacks.
